title: I took Lord Sesshomaru's adviced and stopped dodging.
body:
I just int feed now.

https://i.gyazo.com/81265a031d82f5af80ca9f48a005c8a5.png

God bless, ty for advice.

replies.body: nice, keep it up and hundreds of games later you may get banned. just don't use foul words and you'll be k

don't take advice from anyone from boards tbh.
most are below gold and have no idea what they're talking about.
damn dude thats really cool how you have to fill us in
Do what you want in normals. Seriously though Lord Sesshoomaru is a fool with a title at times.
